title: 3 and Out - Chiefs Finally Rollin', Bills/Pats MNF Preview, CFP Matchups and Cristobal ---> The U Rumors
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Chiefs Finally Rollin', Bills/Pats MNF Preview, CFP Matchups and Cristobal ---> The U Rumors
description:
John reacts to the Chiefs SNF win over the Broncos and why it's a huge game for Josh Allen. He also looks ahead to the massive AFC East MNF showdown between the Bills and Patriots, and previews the CFP semifinal matchups. Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
